    Classes in org.infinispan.globalstate.impl that implement LocalConfigurationStorage
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ImmutableLocalConfigurationStorage
    An immutable implementation of LocalConfigurationStorage which does not allow cache creation/removal.
    class 
    OverlayLocalConfigurationStorage
    An implementation of LocalConfigurationStorage which stores non-CacheContainerAdmin.AdminFlag.VOLATILE
    class 
    VolatileLocalConfigurationStorage
    An implementation of LocalConfigurationStorage which does only supports CacheContainerAdmin.AdminFlag.VOLATILE operations
